name: Plantasia (deathbysnail)
description:
Plantasia is a physics-driven plant growing meditative experience. Growth, water/energy levels, and plant capillary are all simulated. combining to make a weirdly hypnotic little toy.

Mouse Left adds water to the system, drag mouse right to cut parts of the plant.

Made for Ludum Dare 46 from the theme "Keep it alive", which applied way more in the development of a functional and balanced system than it does in the final product.

Inspired by the album of the same name, by Mort Garson:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SZkR3PyHTs0
